nodes.text: The End of Days was a Keldabe-class battleship of the Zann Consortium's pirate fleet, that served as the flagship of Admiral Jerid Sykes. The End of Days was staffed by some of the Consortium's best officers and crew, and was often used as Tyber Zann's personal transport. Following the Battle of Yavin, Admiral Sykes and the End of Days led a Consortium fleet in a battle against the pirates of the Veiled Sorority.

The End of Days was introduced to the Star Wars universe in the Edge of the Empire roleplaying-game's supplementary adventure guide titled Mask of the Pirate Queen, published on November 19, 2015 by Fantasy Flight Games.
